items.value: Michael needs your help at the Center!

Great that you are there, I have to tell you something!
The Donuts helped and bribed the Gang.

Now they see me as a member and don't hit me anymore.
But the leader is still critical and wants proof of loyalty.

Can you please find me the following fish:
3x Padulo (Fish)

It is said to be found where XCoder lives!
i have 3x Padulo with me and 2x free Inv. Slots!
i will get that fish and be back asap!

This fish will appease the leader.
I see your friend forever in your debt.

Michael gives you:
1x Home Phone (boxed)
3x filled Wallet

Come back to me if you want to join the Gang too!

Sorry but I need the Fish!
I can't keep inside this Gang without it.

Come back when you got the fish ..
Mkay.. i will go for it!
